task: Develop a basic 'Rummy' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Courage!'.
name: Rummy Courage

branding_data.short_description: Rummy Courage is a bold twist on the classic card game Rummy, encouraging daring strategies and fearless plays.
branding_data.detailed_description: Rummy Courage takes the traditional game of Rummy and infuses it with a spirit of boldness and daring. In this version, players are encouraged to take risks and make courageous moves, with special mechanics that reward bravery and strategic audacity. The game introduces new cards and rules that challenge players to step out of their comfort zones and think outside the box. With elements that push for high-stakes decisions and unpredictable outcomes, Rummy Courage is a thrilling and dynamic experience that redefines the classic card game.
